abilities.name: Stifling Dagger
abilities.description: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing a portion of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as instant attack.
abilities.notes: Applies attack modifiers. Has True Strike.

abilities.name: Phantom Strike
abilities.description: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
abilities.notes: Can be used on friendly units to escape.

abilities.name: Blur
abilities.description: When activated, Phantom Assassin is untargetable, invisible, and enemy units only see her silhouette. Passively provides movement speed bonus.

abilities.name: Coup de Grace
abilities.description: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units.
abilities.notes: Critical strikes apply to Stifling Dagger as well.

innate_abilities.name: Immaterial
innate_abilities.description: The immaterial assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks.
innate_abilities.notes: Uses pseudo-random distribution and stacks diminishingly with other evasion sources.
